articles.author: Karandeep Singh Oberoi
articles.title: Google is pulling the plug on older Nest Thermostats - Android Police
articles.description: And shuttering its thermostat business in Europe
articles.content:
Summary
<ul><li>
 Google will end support for the first and second generations of the Nest Learning Thermostat on October 25, 2025, removing smart features and app integration, effectively turning … [+3143 chars]
